nodes.text: Hissrich was a jungle planet located in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. During the early stages of the Clone Wars the Confederacy of Independent Systems attempted to establish footholds in the Outer Rim before they moved towards the galactic capital, one such example of this was Hissrich where a large number of vessels were sent. Jedi Master Mace Windu was tasked by the Jedi High Council with traveling to Hissrich and determining what the Separatists' purpose was.
